dc:title: On Pilgrimage - December 1970
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Impressions of Tanzanian socialism with extensive quotes from the writings of Julius Nyerere it President. Sees similarities between Nyerere and Peter Maurin's ideals. Calls their New York house and farm a commune and school of non-violence.
